item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 35,take US3 north,make a right onto Gale River Loop Road (FR92) at whichever entrance is open,park at Garfield Trail Parking Lot.We will hike the Garfield Trail to the summit of Mount Garfield (4500'). Good views from the summit. 10 miles round trip, 3000 feet elevation gain, Appalachian Mountain Club White Mountain Guide Book Time 6 hours, 9 hours estimated time for our group.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: STRENUOUS HIKE-MOUNT GARFIELD
